thread.title: 800 Words star Melina Vidler: ‘I didn’t feel good enough’
thread.title_full: 800 Words star Melina Vidler: ‘I didn’t feel good enough’ | DailyTelegraph

author: Tiffany Dunk
title: 800 Words star Melina Vidler: ‘I didn’t feel good enough’
text:
STARRING as Erik Thomson’s daughter in 800 Words means Melina Vidler has had her fair share of Jessica Marais comparisons. But the 22-year-old star on the rise says she’s more than okay with that.
“It’s a massive compliment,” she said.
“Not only is Jessica physically gorgeous but she is just so talented. She’s in amazing productions and smashes it. And while I haven’t met her, from what I hear she’s lovely.”
All smiles ... Melina Vidler is having the time of her life starring in 800 Words. Picture: Toby Zerna
No longer a wallflower ... Melina Vidler overcame self doubt and body image pressure. Picture: Toby Zerna
Family values ... Melina Vidler formed a fast bond with her onscreen dad, Erik Thomson, and brother, Benson Jack Anthony. Picture: Tim Hunter.
Star quality ... Alex Tarrant plays Vidler’s onscreen love interest in 800 Words.
Schoolyard antics ... In 800 Words, Shay is far from the shrinking violet Vidler was in her own high school days.
